product_description: Fresh & Ready Foods Chicken Salad Croissant Sandwich, 6oz. plastic container. Best buy: 05/09/2025-05/12/2025  UPC# 6 82906 89056 7
reason_for_recall: Listeria Monocytogenes detected on food contact surfaces in Ready To Eat sandwich manufacturer facility.
